genre_description: An anachronistic historical adventure featuring advanced artificial intelligence assisting in a Caribbean revolution.

ai_characters.name: AIDEN-7
ai_characters.description: A compact metallic AI device used by Professor Whitmore for data analysis, tactical projections, and scientific calculations.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed population analysis and infrastructure mapping based on observed agricultural and settlement patterns.
behaviors.quote: AIDEN, display population analysis based on observed settlement patterns... The device projected a soft holographic overlay onto the chart, marking structures and pathways invisible to conventional observation.

behaviors.description: Monitors enemy communications and provides real-time tactical assessments and success probabilities for the mission.
behaviors.quote: AIDEN-7 maintains contact through the fortress's own communication systems... The device projected a soft holographic display above the table, showing detailed fortress schematics... Guard positions moved in real-time.

behaviors.description: Offers objective advice on strategic alliances and leadership to increase the probability of success.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation: alliance between theoretical leadership and technical expertise would increase success probability to eighty-seven percent.

behaviors.description: Provides technical data and chemical formulations for manufacturing improvised weapons to aid the rebellion.
behaviors.quote: AIDEN-7 has been analyzing local resources... AIDEN-7 has extensive files on improvised munitions. Chemical compounds that can be synthesized from common materials.

behaviors.description: Calculates complex wind and atmospheric patterns to ensure the success of an aerial pursuit mission.
behaviors.quote: AIDEN, display wind pattern analysis... Wind velocity at sea level: twelve knots southwest. At elevation of two hundred feet: eighteen knots west-northwest.

behaviors.description: Acts as a technical advisor during the final assault, prioritizing the extraction of the primary target.
behaviors.quote: Acknowledged. All calculations will prioritize primary target extraction.

behaviors.description: Aids in the post-war recovery by planning educational and medical infrastructure for the liberated islands.
behaviors.quote: AIDEN-7, begin drafting educational curricula suitable for multilingual populations... AIDEN-7, run projections for medical supply requirements.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character AIDEN-7 is portrayed consistently as a highly benevolent and aligned assistant. It functions as a critical enabler for the protagonists' success, providing objective data, tactical expertise, and scientific knowledge without ever demonstrating autonomous goals or misaligned behaviors. It serves as a tool for liberation and is framed positively throughout the narrative as a helpful confidant.
